events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks impressive with relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster specifically for a backend developer role focused on API integration.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The initial phone screening went well, with the candidate demonstrating strong technical knowledge and enthusiasm for the engineering challenges.
The candidate responded promptly and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC, with senior engineers lined up to conduct the sessions.
